description: Creates an association between a content resource in a knowledge base and step-by-step guides. Step-by-step guides offer instructions to agents for resolving common customer issues. You create a content association to integrate Amazon Q in Connect and step-by-step guides. After you integrate Amazon Q and step-by-step guides, when Amazon Q provides a recommendation to an agent based on the intent that it's detected, it also provides them with the option to start the step-by-step guide that you have associated with the content. Note the following limitations: For more information, see Integrate Amazon Q in Connect with step-by-step guides in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base.

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: The identifier of the associated resource. amazonConnectGuideAssociation (dict) --- The data of the step-by-step guide association. flowId (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Connect flow. Step-by-step guides are a type of flow.

nested_params.name: amazonConnectGuideAssociation
nested_params.description: The data of the step-by-step guide association.

nested_params.name: flowId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Connect flow. Step-by-step guides are a type of flow.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: contentAssociation
nested_items.description: The association between Amazon Q in Connect content and another resource.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: contentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content.

nested_items.name: contentAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the content association. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: contentAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the content association.

nested_items.name: amazonConnectGuideAssociation
nested_items.description: The data of the step-by-step guide association.

nested_items.name: flowId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Connect flow. Step-by-step guides are a type of flow.
